Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Ebe foto si, Peter Obi
Peter Obi chiburu Anambra Steetị na-achọ ịzọ ọkwa onyeisiala Naịjirịa n'aha PDP apụọla na pati ahụ.
Peter Obi
O kwuru nke a n'ozi si n'akara Twiter ya pụta n'ụbọchị Wenezde 25 Mee, 2022.
N'akwụkwọ ozi o degaara onyeisi pati PDP bụ Sịnetọ Iyorchia Ayu n'ụbọchị Tuzde 24 Mee, afọ 2022 sị na Obi esepụla aka n'ịzọ ọkwa Onyeisiala n'aha pati ahụ.
Obi sị na obi dị ya ụtọ iwulite obodo Naịjirịa n'aha PDP mana ọtụtụ ihe ndị na-emegasị na pati ha ugbua mere o jiri raa ya ahụ ịganihu isonye na pati ahụ.
Ebe foto si, Peter Obi
Ọ sị na mbọ ọ na-agba ịzọpụta Naịjirịa n'aka ọdịda ka dị ire na-agbanyeghi n'ụzọ ọ ga-esi eme ya nwereike ịdị iche.
Obi gaara n'ihu kelee onyeisi pati ya maka ma sị ya jisie ike n'ihe ọ na-eme na pati ahụ.
Nkwpụpụta a Obi mere gbagwojuru ọtụtụ mmadụ anya dịka ha na-ajụ 'kedụ ebe ọzọ o nwereike itinye isi?'
Peter ekwubeghi pati ọzọ ọ ga-abanye maọbụ ihe ọzọ ọ ga-eme dịka ọ dị ugbua mana na mkparịtaụka ya na BBC Igbo nwere n'oge gara aga, ọ sị na o nweghi onye maara echi
Arụkwaghị m Peter Obi gbara na-abịa dịka ọ fọrọ ụbọchị atọ ka e mee ntuliaka ime ụlọ nke PDP maka ọkwa Onyeisiala.
Nke a ga-adị n'ụbọchị 28 na 29 Mee, afọ 2020 n'Abuja.
Ndị gosiri mmasị ha n'ịzọ ọkwa ahụ gụnyere; Atiku Abubakar, Bukola Saraki, Sam Ohabunwa, Aminu Tambuwal, Nyesom Wike, Bala Mohammed and Ayo Fayose.
Ndị ọzọ bụ Anyim Pius Ayim, Emmanuel Udom, Dele Momodu, Mohammed Hayatu-Deen na ndị ọzọ.
Ebe foto si, Peter Obi
A mụrụ Peter Gregory Obi n'Ọnịcha na 19 July 1961.
Ọ gara ụlọakwụkwọ Praịmarị Sancta Maria Primary School Onitsha nakwa ụlọakwụkwọ sekọndịrị Christ the King College, Onitsha.
O nwere ụmụnne anọ.

Ọ gara mahadum University of Nigeria, Nsukka (B.A), Lagos Business School, Nigeria, Harvard Business School, Boston, London School of Economics, Columbia Business School, New York nakwa Institute for Management Development, Switzerland
A ma ya dịka onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị na onye oji ego achụ ego.
Ọ bụ osote Atiku Abubakar na ntuliaka 2019 n'okpuru otu patị People's Democratic Party PDP.
Ọ lụrụ nwunye ya bụ Ododziakụ Margaret Brownson Usen n'afọ 1992. Ha mụrụ ụmụ abụọ.
